Sentencas: An integrated gasification solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and Stirling engine for combined heat and power application is analyzed.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: The target for electricity production is 120 kW. Woodchips are used as gasification feedstock to produce syngas, which is then used to feed the SOFC stacks for electricity production.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Unreacted hydrocarbons remaining after the SOFC are burned in a catalytic burner, and the hot off-gases from the burner are recovered in a Stirling engine for electricity and heat production.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Domestic hot water is used as a heat sink for the Stirling engine.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: A complete balance-of-plant is designed and suggested.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Thermodynamic analysis shows that a thermal efficiency of 42.4% based on the lower heating value (LHV) can be achieved if all input parameters are selected conservatively.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Different parameter studies are performed to analyze the system behavior under different conditions.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: The analysis shows that the decreasing number of stacks from a design viewpoint, indicating that plant efficiency decreases but power production remains nearly unchanged.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Furthermore, the analysis shows that there is an optimum value for the utilization factor of the SOFC for the suggested plant design with the suggested input parameters.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: This optimum value is approximately 65%, which is a rather modest value for SOFC.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: In addition, introducing a methanator increases plant efficiency slightly.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: If SOFC operating temperature decreases due to new technology then plant efficiency will slightly be increased.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine

Sentencas: Decreasing gasifier temperature, which cannot be controlled, causes the plant efficiency to increase also.
Titulo: Biomass gasification integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell and Stirling engine
